Generation I.Red: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
Generation I.Yellow: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this Pok é mon . It appears that the scales grow in cycles.
Generation I.Stadium: Its super-hard, needle-like scales stand up when excited. It uses its hefty bulk for performing powerful moves.

Generation II.Gold: Its body is covered with needle-like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any attack.
Generation II.Silver: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
Generation II.Crystal: The hard scales that cover its strong body serve as excellent protection from any attack.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Its body is covered with needle-like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any attack. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Nidoqueen 's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pok é mon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
Generation III.Sapphire: Nidoqueen 's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pok é mon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
Generation III.Emerald: It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles using its tough, scaly body. This Pok é mon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
Generation III.FireRed: The body is covered by stiff, needle-like scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

Generation VIII.Sword: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
Generation VIII.Shield: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.
